{{Actor| | type = Map spot | name = Sector Action: "Player Uses Sector" | class = SecActUse | doomednum = 9995 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:SectorAction|SectorAction]]→SecActUse
This is a ZDoom-specific thing that triggers its special when a player presses the "use" key anywhere in the sector except within activation range of a linedef with a special. (If the linedef already has a use-activated special, then this special is activated instead.) See also: [[Thing executed specials]] ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR SecActUse : {{Class|SectorAction}} native {}
